metadata.title: CVE-2023-36321 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Connected Vehicle Systems Alliance (COVESA) up to v2.18.8 was discovered tocontain a buffer overflow via the component /shared/dlt_common.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-36321` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dlt-daemon - 2.18.10-5
dlt-tools - 2.18.10-5
libdlt-examples - 2.18.10-5
libdlt2 - 2.18.10-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dlt-daemon package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.18.10-5').
